column4: Help needed to format a IDE hdd which has been attached to my Ubuntu 7.04 machine with a SATA hdd
Fire up gnome partiton manager and go for it.
there are restrictions to access those drives in Gpart
If you mean permissions etc before formatting... unmount it/them
may i pm you
Or join #Voyager
Help needed to mount my DVD drive
it should automount when you drop in a dvd...
It is not automounting and displays an error
I am involved in a few other discussions.. but posting the exact error will help people help you.
I would do that
post your fstab to the pastebin please.... not in the channel
thats not the fstab output its a screenshot of what i get
I saw that... and asked you to.... post fstab...
Here is the fstab output http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/36343/
It looks fine... same as mine... is it all dvd;s or just this one.
Actually i was burning a DVD using K3B after which the error appeared
sounds like a bad burn
what am i supposed to do
try a known good dvd....
Now it works fine after inserting another DVD disc
Thanks for the help
then you have a bad burn, bad download but not a ubuntu problrm
